name: Osprey Kitsuma 3 Pack - Women's
description: When you want to carry your water, and only your water. This low-profile pack has a pocket and stretch side panels to carry snacks and keys, plus a large dedicated compartment holds a water bladder. A magnet holds the bite valve out of the way when you're ripping down the trails.Foam back panel has ridges and a central channel to let air flow through your back while keeping the load close to your body.Shoulder straps and back panel have a mesh overlay for breathability and soft edges that are gentle on skin.Small zippered pocket holds a few essentials.Includes an Osprey Hydraulics LT 2.5L reservoir with a magnet that holds the bite valve on the shoulder strap.Rear loop for attaching a blinky light and reflective details enhance nighttime visibility.Female-specific fit.
